translation.text: Delays to services due to urgent track equipment repairs at Homebush and a train requiring mechanical repairs at Parramatta earlier. Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements, check indicator boards and transport apps for any changes as stopping patterns and platforms may change at short notice.

ICC T20 Women's World Cup Semi Finals - Sydney Cricket Ground, Moore Park
Semi Final 1 India v England: 15:00 to 17:45
Semi Final 2 South Africa v Australia: 19:00 to 21:45
- Valid pre-purchased match tickets include travel on Sydney Trains, Sydney Metro, Regular bus, Sydney & Newcastle Ferries and Sydney Light rail services.
- The closest station to the SCG is Central. Change for a light rail service to Moore Park leaving from Chalmers Street stop.

NBL Semi Final Game 3: Sydney Kings v Melbourne United - Qudos Bank Arena, Sydney Olympic Park
19:35 to 21:45
- Valid pre-purchased match tickets include travel on Sydney Trains and Sydney Metro services.
- Trains run from Lidcombe to Olympic Park every 10 minutes until midnight.

Details: https://transportnsw.info/events/2020/03
With intermittent rainfall being experienced today, please be weather wise and avoid rushing and stepping in puddles to prevent slips, trips and falls.
Major weekday trackwork - Blue Mountains Line

Monday 2 to Friday 6 March 
- Buses replace trains between Lithgow and Mount Victoria.
- Trains run to a changed timetable between Mount Victoria and Central.
- Daily from 09:30 until 17:30, buses replace trains between Lithgow and Katoomba.
- Trains run between Katoomba and Central, some to a changed timetable.
- Trains run between Bathurst and Lithgow. 
- The following trains continue to run between Bathurst and Central:
    - 05:46 Bathurst to Central, arriving 09:56 
    - 17:47 Central to Bathurst, arriving 22:00
due to an operational issue. Please allow additional travel time.
due to urgent track equipment repairs at Homebush. Please allow additional travel time.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Blacktown.
Ashfield due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Parramatta.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs.
due to a freight train with mechanical problems at Medlow Bath earlier.
Granville due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Parramatta.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Parramatta.
due to wet weather conditions causing slower boarding times.
due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Blackheath earlier.
due to a customer disturbance at Wollongong
The lift between the footbridge and Beecroft Road is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 8878 4100
The lift between the concourse and platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9851 7431.
The lift between the concourse and Harvey Road is temporarily out of service.
The lift between the concourse and bus bay D is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and bus bay E is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9224 2959.
The lift between the footbridge and Howarth St is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4353 1915.
The lift between the concourse and platform 3 is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 4625 0666.

Drop-off zones on Kirkham Road alongside platform 1 will not be accessible until June due to scheduled council roadworks. An alternative drop-off zone is available at the Station Car Park located on Station Street.  Please allow additional time in order to catch your service.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Station Upgrade - Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrade the lifts from the concourse level to George Street will be closed until July 2020. Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.
